title: nice
body: I think it's great that the game bugs out and you just wanna play after a trash day, but then your client refuses to load up your game, your client starts patching, and then your team reports you for being afk. And finally to top it all off, you get the longest leavers.

replies.body:
Oh you're just getting started for the many horrible experiences to come.

Anyway, now you know your mistake, if it bugs out on you while loading into the start of the game, task manager and exit out of league entirely, endtask and wait 3 mins for remake. gotta be fast,you got til the 1:29 sec mark where remake will be rendered ineffective and you get punished hard if not reported and severely more when reported.
